Hidden Object Game For Free : Rituals Of Night

If you love detective stories, adventures, unexpected turns of a plot – this game is for you.

Complete the tasks, solve the riddles, find all missing items, solve a photo puzzle, work your way out of the traps, and find all hidden objects in this exciting game! The game with energy, the whole adventure is open to you.

- New best mystery game and thrilling adventure hidden object games of 2022 !

Play “ Rituals Of Night Hidden Object Game" Now to explore and unlock the full adventure puzzle inside.

Find hidden objects at your own place. Find objects by their picture, silhouette, word or random combination. Sit back, relax and play casual rounds with no time pressure or – if you fancy a challenge – you can play the trickier timed modes. Can you find all the hidden objects before time runs out?
